xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Identity OAuth Base Translations
xwikidoc.content:
admin.idoauth=Identity OAuth admin.idoauth.default.heading=XWiki Provider admin.idoauth.default.description=Configurations for the basic XWiki login. admin.idoauth.general.heading=Identity OAuth Providers admin.idoauth.general.description=General configurations for the Identity OAuth providers, considering the XWiki login option as the default implementation.
idoauth.extension.name=Identity OAuth Application (Pro) idoauth.config.heading=Identity OAuth Integration Configuration IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_config.explanation=XWiki can be integrated with an external provider.
## Adminstration interface IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_active=Activate IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_communicate=Communication with the OAuth service IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_communicate.hint=To activate an OAuth integration you need to {0} and to insert your Client-Id and secret in the following settings. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_communicate.hint.linkLabel=register for OAuth access to the provider''s configuration IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_communicate.hint2=For more information, please see {0}. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_communicate.hint2.linkLabel=the installation instructions
IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_appname=Application Name IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_appname.hint=For your own organisation. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_clientid=Client ID IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_clientid.hint=The provider indicates this. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_secret=Secret Key IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_secret.hint=The provider indicates this.
IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_scope=Permissions to request IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_scope.hint=Which information should XWiki request to the the provider about the account? IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_scope_identity=First and last name IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_scope_email=Email address IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_scope_avatar=User image IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_checkbox_mandatory=This is required IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_checkbox_notyetdone=This is not implemented yet
IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl = Return URL IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.hint = A user is returned to the login page of this wiki with extra parameters after the OAuth authorization. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.asExpected = This address matches the login page URL that can be expected from the URL of your browser. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.notAsExpected = This address does not match the login page URL that can be expected from the URL of your browser.
IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.placeHolderMessage = (default: computed by the server; {0}) IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.asExpectedServers = This address matches the login page URL that can be expected from the URL of your server. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.asExpectedBrowsers = This address matches the login page URL that can be expected from the URL of your browser. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.notAsExpectedAny = This address does not match the login page URL. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.recalc.predicted = Recalculate URL IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.recalc.browser = Recalculate URL from the current browser page IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_redirectUrl.recalc.server = Recalculate URL from the server
IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_loginbehaviour=XWiki Login Behaviour IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_useCookies=Use of cookies for Login IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_useCookies.hint=These cookies allow browsers to remember which user was used to login to the Wiki.
IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_warningIncomplete=Please provide all information or disable the app.
IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_nowWhat1=Using a different browser, please try to login to the XWiki. IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthConfigClass_nowWhat2=Should you need support, please ask support@xwiki.com
IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthGeneralConfigClass_defaultProvider=Default provider IdentityOAuth.IdentityOAuthGeneralConfigClass_defaultProvider.hint=Jump to the login of a specific provider, without having to select it from a list of login options.
IdentityOAuth.OAuthProviderClass_active.hint=Whether this provider should be displayed on the login page
idoauth.login.title=Identity OAuth Login idoauth.login.withoauth=Login with an OAuth provider idoauth.login.withxwiki=Login with XWiki
## error reporting idoauth.login.error=An error occurred while trying to login with the OAuth provider. Please contact XWiki Support for help or try again. idoauth.login.message=You are being redirected to the OAuth provider for Authentication. idoauth.login.redirectmessage=You are being redirected to your requested page. idoauth.login.oauth.message=OAuth authentication in progress idoauth.login.oauth.success=Successful authentication. idoauth.login.oauth.successwithredirect=Successful authentication. You are being redirected to your page.
idoauth.error.noValidLicense=A license for this application is missing. Please visit the License setting (in the Extensions section) to obtain one. idoauth.error.extensionDisabled=The IdentityOAuth integration is disabled on this wiki.
idoauth.webHome.1=This is the code for the Identity OAuth extension, allowing to integrate XWiki with external provider identities. idoauth.webHome.2=... idoauth.webHome.3=... idoauth.webHome.4=Go to the administration section of your specific provider in order to configure the application.
